Pre-Game Insights: England's Gareth Southgate is under pressure to deliver with arguably England's brightest squad in a generation.
Belgium's golden generation is in decline, but they still pose a threat with Romelu Lukaku, Jeremy Doku, and Leandro Trossard set to lead the line in London.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans can tune in to watch the game for free on Channel 4 from 7pm.
You can also live stream the match via Channel 4 on a range of devices including laptops, smartphones, and tablets.
The match will kick off at 7:45pm.
Others: The Three Lions were lacklustre as they fell to a 1-0 defeat to Brazil at the weekend, despite the best efforts of Jude Bellingham.
